title: Police Say Woman Shot Her Husband & Son
content:
DUNDALK, Md. (WJZ) — Baltimore County police say a 30-year-old woman shot her estranged husband and their son Saturday evening.
Police say the woman had gone to her husband’s home to pick up their son when the two started fighting. The husband started to take the boy inside when she pulled out a gun and fired. The husband was struck in the upper body and the son was struck in his lower body.
Both are expected to survive.
The woman was taken into custody at the scene.
